segments.text: The light streaming in from the window casts such a gentle glow in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But underneath that beauty lies a brewing disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's indifference to the overflowing sink frustrates me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems oblivious to the chaos just a few feet away from her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so close to reaching the cookies, and I feel my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I watch the girl, her expectant expression only amplifying the tension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen, so full of life and routine, feels like a ticking time bomb.
segments.speaker: PAR
